infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.beacon_cro_01_lore:
UNITED EUROPAN COALITION
USER: Niel Stewart
ID#: 225138693
Inbox:
From: Karin Provsky
Hi Niel, I'm sorry to hear about Darnell, and try not to be to hard on Becky I know she can be a handfull at times. I understand your concern, and its comforting to know you care.
Outbox:
To: Karin Provsky
Hi Karin, Darnell is still not doing so good and Becky is starting to give me a headache. Anyway i hope this message finds you in good health, I worry about you working with those radicals, stay safe.
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.beacon_ryr_04_doorcon: [1] - OPEN THE DOOR\n[0] - CLOSE THE DOOR
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.beacon_ryr_08_beacon: =======STATIONARY MODE=======\nMOBILE BEACON STATION 'BUMBLEBEE' ACTIVATED IN STATIONARY MODE\nMOVEMENT FUNCTIONS ARE UNAVAILABLE
